Text: 910px, wait for the Novus release if you don't like it
not a like or dislike, I'm astounded at the size and wasn't sure if it was a mistake or files were missing...
or if I should ask about the brand new, AWESOME CODEC you were using!
sincerely the Re-em scanner from Novus does every star trek issue. these pages are unusually small at 910px wide (although 2 or 3 years ago that was the norm).
